about.title: About me
about.description:
I work as a Front-end Developer, focused on building modern, responsive, and well-structured web interfaces. My main stack is React, with experience across its ecosystem, including Next.js. I have worked with Vite as a build and development tool, as well as on Micro Frontends (MFE) architectures, aimed at modularity and scalability.

I am familiar with AstroJS, which was used in the development of this portfolio, exploring a performance-focused and content-driven approach.

On the back-end, I have basic knowledge of Node.js and Express, with experience building REST APIs and implementing CRUD operations. I have also worked with Headless CMS solutions, using Strapi (open source) and WordPress in headless mode, integrating them with modern front-end applications.

I have knowledge of prototyping, contributing to better alignment between design and development.

I strive for constant growth as a developer, focusing on best practices, performance, and code quality.
